snippet.title: Grid Runner - Amiga - Playthrough
snippet.description:
No playthrough / longplay of this one on YT so decided to make one. 
One of the best Amiga shmups around. 
Varied missions (some quite hard) and good controls. 

Rating: 8
Difficulty: 7
BS factor: 4

Some of the problems I encounter might be caused by emulation, bad rom files or problems with the setup and might not actually be the games fault, but I have no way of testing this out, so please tell me if something feels off.
